scripts.build: npm run clean && npm i && npm run lint && mkdir results
scripts.test: cucumber-js features/**/*.feature --require-module ts-node/register --require test.setup.ts --require step-definitions/**/*.ts --require hooks/**.ts
scripts.test:appmetrica: cucumber-js project/appmetrica/features/**/*.feature --require-module ts-node/register --require test.setup.ts --require project/appmetrica/steps/**/*.ts --require hooks/**.ts --parallel 5 -f progress -f json:results/results.json
